summary:
Nexus exclusive
Adds 4 different robes to Natterforme\\\'s famous Ebony Mage Armor.
descriptionHtml:
Original Armor
Ebony Mage Armor by Natterforme
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21341

NEXUS EXCLUSIVE

this file includes the original mod plus the variants

I have created 4 variants of natterforme\\\'s Showstopping Ebony Mage Armor Set
in which the robe portion has different color 
there is blue - like apprentice robes
            orange - like adept robes
           brown
           red
this is male and female however the female colors do not look exactly the same as the male counterparts. a bit of a different tint.

The colored variants must be acquired throuygh the console. 
type
help \\\"ebony mage\\\"
it comes in the nonarmor, light armor and heavy armor variants just like the original- however i have altered all the weights to be only a few lbs. It is intended that you should first have the original ebony mage armor and then the other varieties you are only holding and switching the robe section.
The original ebony mage armor must be procured in the exact fashion as the original mod.
author: Natterforme- armor_  frank zunge - retextures
